#Text=Job Description\r
#Text=\r
#Text=At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place.
#Text=From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values.
#Text=We�re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that�s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth.
#Text=Find your... future with us.

#Text=Boeing Global Service Training Systems team is seeking Associate and Experienced Software Engineers to focus on operating system configuration/customization, visualization and software integration.
#Text=Training Systems is responsible for the design, manufacture, development, and maintenance of a wide variety of commercial and military training devices.
#Text=Primary location for these positions will be located in Oklahoma City, OK supporting the ASC2 AWACS Training System platform.
#Text=At Boeing, we are all innovators on a mission to connect, protect, explore and inspire.
#Text=From the sea bed to outer space, you'll learn and grow, contributing to work that shapes the world.
#Text=Position Responsibilities:\r
#Text=� Participate as a member of an impactful, collaborative team and be self-motivated with a strong work ethic, excellent time-management, and interpersonal skills\r
#Text=� Integrate commercial and Boeing developed software into Windows and RedHat Enterprise Linux operating systems\r
#Text=� Use Agile methodologies to support all aspects of product development and project management\r
#Text=� Scripting to support application of security settings on Windows and RedHat Enterprise Linux platforms\r
#Text=� Designing systems to meet current and future software and application requirements\r
#Text=� Have the ability to work with multiple support teams to identify and resolve issues\r
#Text=� Implement and test software/systems using a variety of technologies to include scripting to support automated testing\r
#Text=� Networking and support of Ethernet and Fiber Channel networks\r
#Text=� Support VMWare and Linux virtualization applications\r
#Text=� Attend design and review board meetings to help facilitate system maturity and lifecycle support\r
#Text=� Storage Area Network and Network Attached Storage administration\r
#Text=� Occasional domestic or international travel may be required.
#Text=This position is hybrid.
#Text=This means that the selected candidate will be required to perform some work onsite at one of the listed location options.
#Text=This is at the hiring team�s discretion and could potentially change in the future.
#Text=This position requires an active U.S.
#Text=Secret Security Clearance (U.S.
#Text=Citizenship Required).
#Text=(A U.S.
#Text=Security Clearance that has been active in the past 24 months is considered active)\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Basic Qualifications (Required Skills and Experience):\r
#Text=� Experience having System Administration experience of Linux/Unix or Windows platforms\r
#Text=� 2+ years of experience in software systems integration\r
#Text=� 2+ years of experience in scripting activities in a Linux or Windows environment\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Desired Experience, Skills and Qualifications:\r
#Text=� 2 or more years' related work experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience\r
#Text=� 3 or more years' related work experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Typical Education and Experience:\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Associate Level:\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Education/experience typically acquired through advanced technical education from an accredited course of study in engineering, computer science, mathematics, physics or chemistry (e.g.
#Text=Bachelor) and typically 2 or more years' related work experience or an equivalent combination of technical education and experience (e.g.
#Text=Masters degree plus experience).
#Text=In the USA, ABET accreditation is the preferred, although not required, accreditation standard.

#Text=Experienced Level: Education/experience typically acquired through advanced technical education from an accredited course of study in engineering, computer science, mathematics, physics or chemistry (e.g.
#Text=Bachelor) and typically 5 or more years' related work experience or an equivalent combination of technical education and experience (e.g.
#Text=PhD, Master+3 years' related work experience).
#Text=In the USA, ABET accreditation is the preferred, although not required, accreditation standard.
#Text=Relocation:\r
#Text=\r
#Text=This position offers relocation based on candidate eligibility.
#Text=Drug Free Workplace\r
#Text=\r

#Text=Boeing is a Drug Free Workplace where post offer applicants and employees are subject to testing for marijuana, cocaine, opioids, amphetamines, PCP, and alcohol when criteria is met as outlined in our policies.
#Text=General\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Shift (US Specific):\r
#Text=\r
#Text=This position is for 1st shift\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Pay Transparency:\r
#Text=\r
#Text=At Boeing, we strive to deliver a Total Rewards package that will attract, engage and retain the top talent.
#Text=Elements of the Total Rewards package include competitive base pay and variable compensation opportunities.

#Text=The Boeing Company also provides eligible employees with an opportunity to enroll in a variety of benefit programs, generally including health insurance, flexible spending accounts, health savings accounts, retirement savings plans, life and disability insurance programs, and a number of programs that provide for both paid and unpaid time away from work.

#Text=The specific programs and options available to any given employee may vary depending on eligibility factors such as geographic location, date of hire, and the applicability of collective bargaining agreements.
#Text=Please note that the salary information shown below is a general guideline only.
#Text=Salaries are based upon candidate experience and qualifications, as well as market and business considerations.
#Text=Summary pay range:\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Associate Level: $79,050 - $106,950\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Experienced Level: $96,900 - $131,100\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Eligible for 3ERP\r
